thread.title: Pedestrian seriously hurt in downtown Denver collision with vehicle
thread.title_full: Pedestrian seriously hurt in downtown Denver collision with vehicle - The Denver Post

author: Jesse Paul
title: Pedestrian seriously hurt in downtown Denver collision with vehicle
text:
One person was seriously injured Wednesday afternoon in downtown Denver after being struck by a vehicle, police say.
The collision happened about 3 p.m. at the intersection of 14th and Champa streets.
Police say the injured pedestrian was taken to a hospital. Additional information was not immediately released.
Jesse Paul: 303-954-1733, jpaul@denverpost.com or @JesseAPaul
